name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Angolmois99
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Angolmois99" is an addictive simple card game based on the prophecy of Nostradamus and includes real-life parody. Users become the earth's representative and compete against the Angolmois Four in card games that will decide the destiny of the planet. Luck, insight, intuition and split-second strategic judgement will determine who is the winner. Get ready for the game!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
